item.title: Air France provides complimentary newspapers and magazines for tablets
item.description: Air France has launched a new app, Air France Press, allowing Flying Blue members to enjoy complimentary digital media offline. Flying Blue members can download a selection of French and international newspapers and magazines at no cost. This content is accessible offline before, during, and after their Air France flights. Passengers can download publications with their ticket, starting 24 hours before their flight until departure. Access to the service is granted by logging into the app using Flying Blue credentials or a reservation number.
